column4: Hello. I have one computer (Windows 7) on a wireless network (WEP), but the Linux PCs cannot logon. Can someone help, please?Ã
can you access your routers config page?
from the 7 computer.  I can also browse Internet.
forget the 7 system, it doesn't matter what it does or doesnt do
can you access the routers config page from Ubuntu?
ok does the interface you connect with get an IP address via dhcp?
ok if you run: route     do yuo get something like this: http://pastebin.com/3Pp1GZXb
its a standard command. "route" is the command. without "s
easy stuff huh, karmic can use the ppa address thing
same ppa also has thunderbird if you want to suckle more from the mozilla teet
